name: NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Program (GRFP) Fellow
description: NSF fellowship recognizes and supports outstanding graduate students in NSF-supported science, technology, engineering, and mathematics disciplines

name: USC Trustee's Award
description: Awarded to the undergraduate male with the highest GPA at the University

name: Graduate Trainee, Stanford Mind, Brain, Computation, and Technology
description: Traineeship awarded for the pursuit of multi-disciplinary research in the area of computational neuroscience

name: USC Neuroscience Outstanding Student of the Year
description: Awarded to USC's best neuroscience student with senior standing

name: USC Brian Philip Rakusin Neuroscience Scholarship Award
description: Awarded to USC's best neuroscience student with junior standing

name: USC Discovery Scholar
description: Awarded to students who excel in the classroom while demonstrating the ability to create exceptional new scholarship.

name: USC Provost's Undergraduate Research Fellowship
description: 6-time recipient of award supporting exceptional undergraduate research

name: George H. Mayr Scholarship
description: Awarded to outstanding students from California in the college of letters, arts, and sciences
